problem:
A1 = "-VI/2" A2 = A1
Our total solution is formed from the sum of the particular solution we found and the general solution of the associated homogeneous equation. The undetermined coefficients in the homogeneous part are determined by the initial conditions.
\( v(t) = V_I + A_1 e^{j\omega_0 t} + A_2 e^{-j\omega_0 t} \)
We were given that \(v(0) = 0\) and \(i(0) = C \frac{dv(t)}{dt}|_{t=0} =0\).
This is enough information to solve for \(A_1\) and \(A_2\).
In the spaces provided write algebraic expressions for \(A_1\) and \(A_2\).
\(A_1 =\)
\(A_2 =\)
